name: The Last Warrior: Heroes
description:
This story is set ten years before the events of the Disney and Yellow, Black and White movie "The Last Warrior" took place. Player is to take the reins of the Fairy Palace in the capital of Belogorie. This mission is complicated and incredibly important. Since the time immemorial this land is inhabited by various fantastic creatures. Some of them are kind and benevolent, while others are quite annoying and always try to pester the people of Belogorie.

The warriors of the land, the Bogatyrs, led by the main character and two fairytale heroes, Ilya of Murom and Dobrynya Nikitich, will fight the Evil, preserve the law and finally bring prosperity to Belogorie. Player will build up a unique palace, develop crafts, train the warriors and send them off to battle the villains.
Join the game and become the leading defender of Belogorie!

FEATURES:
• Game is set in the fantasy world of Disney's movie "The Last Hero", complete with your favorite heroes and villains
• Build up your own palace and develop its unique layout
• Original fairytale-styled graphics
• Advanced multi-level system of crafts
• A user-friendly social interaction option encouraging players to help each other
